comment._content: "Karl Litzmann (January 22, 1850, Neuglobsow, Stechlin, Brandenburg - May 28, 1936, Neuglobsow, Stechlin, Germany) was a German World War I infantry general and later a Nazi official." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karl_Litzmann
